alert.note: Alert for La Salle; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Webb, La Salle, McMullen and northwestern Live Oak Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Esseville to near Fowlerton to near Light. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cotulla, George West, Three Rivers, Encinal, Tilden, Choke Canyon, Cross, Fowlerton, Fort Ewell Site, Artesia Wells, Calliham, Gardendale, Woodward, Zella, Karon, Millett, Oakville, Crowther, Los Angeles and Simmons. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 39 and 82. Interstate 37 between mile markers 58 and 83. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 630. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for south central Texas.
